name: Call of Eldritch: Modern Dwarfare
description:
My entry for the Miz Jam 2020

Use the crossbow, the shot-bow, and the machine-bow to repel the cosmic invasion.

CREDITS

Visual assets:
One bit pack by Kenney
https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Music:
"The Reach Of Hunger" by Zander Noriega
https://soundcloud.com/zander-noriega
Sounds:
ambient sounds by Ogrebane
swish and hit sounds by tarfmagougou
knife sounds by qubodup
spell sound by Bart K
lava sound by Michel Baradari
monster sfx pack by Ogrebane
pain sounds by Michel Baradari
https://opengameart.org
